name: cssobj
description: Runtime CSS manager, Turn CSS into dynamic JS module, Stylesheet CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) in CSSOM, Solve common problems of CSS-in-JS, name space (local) class names

scripts.report: cd dist && gzip < cssobj.min.js > cssobj.min.gz && ls -lh && rm -f *.gz
scripts.build: git rev-parse HEAD > .commithash && rollup -c && uglifyjs dist/cssobj.umd.js -cm -o dist/cssobj.min.js

author: James Yang <jamesyang999@gmail.com>
